title: Coronavirus Updates - Anti-Vaxxers Shut Down Vaccination Site, Rusty Pilots & Childcare Crisis
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates - Anti-Vaxxers Shut Down Vaccination Site, Rusty Pilots & Childcare Crisis
description:
Anti-vaxxers block people from getting vaccinated at Dodger Stadium, airline pilots get rusty due to inactivity, and women bear the burden of a growing childcare crisis in America.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
